name: David Ramirez
text: I'm trying to imagine an open world time travel game design. That would be hellishly hard to write unless the time travel is completely trivial. I can picture doing it semi-open-world  in a small location, like Arkham City-sized, or like the Columbia of Bioshock, but not as big as Skyrim/Fallout.

source_obj.text: I'm trying to imagine an open world time travel game design. That would be hellishly hard to write unless the time travel is completely trivial.
